Description: Features related to managing user accounts and settings.

Submodules.Account Settings: Explains how users can update profile details, change passwords, and manage login settings.

Description: Guidance for installation and initial product setup.

Submodules.Installation & Setup: Provides steps for creating an Instagram account and setting up a user profile.
